announcements.title: Building Agentic AI using IBM Tools - 18th Nov, Tuesday, 2-4 PM
announcements.content:
Hello everyone,
Here is another exciting opportunity to learn Agentic AI building using IBM tools.
Register Now!
Nov 18th, 2-4 PM at Canada Life Village Square (F1027/F1029), Innovation Village
Hands-on Workshop: Building Agents with watsonx Orchestrate
Learning Objectives
By the end of this session, youâ€™ll be able to:
Understand what watsonx Orchestrate is and how it works
Build agents without writing any code
Integrate tools and knowledge bases into your agents
Create agentic RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) solutions
Use external tools like Firecrawl for web scraping
Govern Agents
This is a hands-on session, so donâ€™t forget to bring your laptop!
Itâ€™s also a fantastic chance to meet industry experts from IBM and gain insights into their expectations.

announcements.title: Group Enrollment
announcements.content:
Dear all,
Group enrollment is now open!
Please ensure you join a group for your project. You are free to form groups with anyone you wish to work with, and the group will remain the same until the end of the term. Each group must have between 2 andÂ 5 members, as projects will be challenging with fewer than four participants. To join a group, go to the Groups Page (Click on the course -> Communications -> Groups).
Please complete your group enrollment by September 9 at 1:00 pm.
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me via email.
Thank you,
Magdalene
